questions.question: What is compound interest?
questions.answer: Interest earned on both the initial principal and previously accumulated interest

questions.name: Interest Rates
questions.question: What is APR and how does it affect loan payments?
questions.explanation: APR (Annual Percentage Rate) represents the yearly cost of borrowing, including interest and fees. A higher APR means higher monthly payments and more total cost over the loan term.

questions.name: Loan Terms
questions.question: How does the loan term affect your monthly payments?
questions.explanation: A longer loan term typically results in lower monthly payments but higher total interest paid over time. Shorter terms mean higher monthly payments but less total interest.
